member.name: ID2D1RadialGradientBrush.GetCenter
member.summary: Retrieves the center of the gradient ellipse.
member.returns: The center of the gradient ellipse. This value is expressed in the brush's coordinate space.

member.name: ID2D1RadialGradientBrush.GetGradientOriginOffset
member.summary: Retrieves the offset of the gradient origin relative to the gradient ellipse's center.
member.returns: The offset of the gradient origin from the center of the gradient ellipse. This value is expressed in the brush's coordinate space.

member.name: ID2D1RadialGradientBrush.GetGradientStopCollection
member.summary: Retrieves the associated with this radial gradient brush object.
member.param: The object associated with this linear gradient brush object. This parameter is passed uninitialized.

member.name: ID2D1RadialGradientBrush.GetRadiusX
member.summary: Retrieves the x-radius of the gradient ellipse.
member.returns: The x-radius of the gradient ellipse. This value is expressed in the brush's coordinate space.

member.name: ID2D1RadialGradientBrush.GetRadiusY
member.summary: Retrieves the y-radius of the gradient ellipse.
member.returns: The y-radius of the gradient ellipse. This value is expressed in the brush's coordinate space.

member.name: ID2D1RadialGradientBrush.SetCenter
member.summary: Specifies the center of the gradient ellipse in the brush's coordinate space.
member.param: The center of the gradient ellipse, in the brush's coordinate space.

member.name: ID2D1RadialGradientBrush.SetGradientOriginOffset
member.summary: Specifies the offset of the gradient origin relative to the gradient ellipse's center.
member.param: The offset of the gradient origin from the center of the gradient ellipse.

member.name: ID2D1RadialGradientBrush.SetRadiusX
member.summary: Specifies the x-radius of the gradient ellipse, in the brush's coordinate space.
member.param: The x-radius of the gradient ellipse. This value is in the brush's coordinate space.

member.name: ID2D1RadialGradientBrush.SetRadiusY
member.summary: Specifies the y-radius of the gradient ellipse, in the brush's coordinate space.
member.param: The y-radius of the gradient ellipse. This value is in the brush's coordinate space.

member.name: ID2D1RadialGradientBrush
member.summary: Paints an area with a radial gradient.
